title: Pset_MaterialMechanical
description: A set of mechanical material properties normally used for structural analysis purpose. It contains all properties which are independent of the actual material type.

DynamicViscosity.title: DynamicViscosity
DynamicViscosity.description: A measure of the viscous resistance of the material.

YoungModulus.title: YoungModulus
YoungModulus.description: A measure of the Young's modulus of elasticity of the material.

ShearModulus.title: ShearModulus
ShearModulus.description: A measure of the shear modulus of elasticity of the material.

PoissonRatio.title: PoissonRatio
PoissonRatio.description: A measure of the lateral deformations in the elastic range.

ThermalExpansionCoefficient.title: ThermalExpansionCoefficient
ThermalExpansionCoefficient.description: A measure of the expansion coefficient for warming up the material about one Kelvin.
